p: Briefly, BG-Sentinel traps (BioQuip Products, Rancho Dominiguez, CA, USA) were baited with carbon dioxide in the form of dry ice. In each city, 12 traps were set up in vegetation close to human habitation at our selected sites at 7 am and retrieved at 6 pm on the same day [ 11]. This was done for five consecutive days in each season in each city, translating to 180 traps per city (60 traps per season). Alongside the BG trapping, Ae. aegypti mosquitoes were collected indoors (sitting room, bedroom, and kitchen) using a battery powered Prokopack aspirator (BioQuip Products, Rancho Dominguez, CA, USA) from 150 houses per city (50 per season). Aspiration was done between 11am and 3pm, and lasted about 20 minutes per house.
